messages.subject: DEAR FRIEND.............................
messages.body:
MARTINEK CHARMBERS 

#18 KINGS ROAD, LAGOS. 

TEL: 234-803...................... 
Email: martinekelvin@yahoo.co.uk 
 Dear Friend, 
I am Barrister Martine Kelvin. 
A Solicitor. I am the Personal Attorney to "Mr. Mark Clement", a Foreign
national who works with Chevron Oil Development Company in Nigeria. 

On the 21st of April 1999, my client, his wife and their three children were
involved in a car accident along Abuja Express Road. 
Unfortunately they all lost their lives in the event of the accident. 

Since then I have made several enquiries to your 
Embassy to locate any of my client's extended relatives, this has also proved
unsuccessful. 

After these several unsuccessful attempts, I decided to trace his relatives
over the Internet to locate any member of his family but of no avail, hence, I
contacted you to assist in repatriating the money left behind by my client in a
Security Company outside. 
Particularly, the Security Company where the deceased deposited the two trunk
boxes containing $15Million (Fifteen Million United States Dollars Only) does
not know the content of the two trunk boxes deposited with them. 

Consequently, the Security Company issued me a notice to provide the
Next-of-Kin to claim the two trunk boxes in their custody within the next ten
official working days. 
Since I have been unsuccessful in locating the relatives for over 2 years now,
I seek your consent to present you as the next-of-kin of the deceased to claim
the two trunk boxes since you are a foreigner so that the two trunk boxes can
be release to you by the security company as soon as i send to you the relevant
document covering this 
fund. 

Upon receipt of the two trunk boxes, I will come over to your country to meet
with you for the disbursement of the fund, and then you and i can share the
money : 50% to me and 40% to you, while 10% will be used on expenses incurred. 
I have all the necessary legal documents that can back up any claim we may make
with the Security Company. 
All I require is your honest co-operation to enable us see this deal through. I
guarantee that this will be executed under a legitimate arrangement that will
protect you from any breach of the law. 

Please get in touch with me by my secured and confidential Email Address: and
on the above stated private telephone numbers to enable us discuss further. 
Please indicate your telephone and fax number for further
discussion/clarification. 
Best regards 

Barrister. Martine Kelvin.
messages.raw:
MARTINE KELVIN

FROM: MARTINE KELVIN(ESQ)
MARTINEK CHARMBERS
#18 KINGS ROAD, LAGOS.
TEL: 234-803......................
Email: martinekelvin@yahoo.co.uk

Dear Friend,
I am Barrister Martine Kelvin.
A Solicitor. I am the Personal Attorney to "Mr. Mark Clement", a Foreign national who works with Chevron Oil Development Company in Nigeria.

On the 21st of April 1999, my client, his wife and their three children were involved in a car accident along Abuja Express Road.
Unfortunately they all lost their lives in the event of the accident.
Since then I have made several enquiries to your Embassy to locate any of my client's extended relatives, this has also proved unsuccessful.

After these several unsuccessful attempts, I decided to trace his relatives over the Internet to locate any member of his family but of no avail, hence, I contacted you to assist in repatriating the money left behind by my client in a Security Company outside.
Particularly, the Security Company where the deceased deposited the two trunk boxes containing $15Million (Fifteen Million United States Dollars Only) does not know the content of the two trunk boxes deposited with them.

Consequently, the Security Company issued me a notice to provide the Next-of-Kin to claim the two trunk boxes in their custody within the next ten official working days.
Since I have been unsuccessful in locating the relatives for over 2 years now, I seek your consent to present you as the next-of-kin of the deceased to claim the two trunk boxes since you are a foreigner so that the two trunk boxes can be release to you by the security company as soon as i send to you the relevant document covering this fund.

Upon receipt of the two trunk boxes, I will come over to your country to meet with you for the disbursement of the fund, and then you and i can share the money : 50% to me and 40% to you, while 10% will be used on expenses incurred. I have all the necessary legal documents that can back up any claim we may make with the Security Company.
All I require is your honest co-operation to enable us see this deal through. I guarantee that this will be executed under a legitimate arrangement that will protect you from any breach of the law.

Please get in touch with me by my secured and confidential Email Address: and on the above stated private telephone numbers to enable us discuss further.
Please indicate your telephone and fax number for further discussion/clarification.
Best regards

Barrister. Martine Kelvin.

messages.body:
Oh that is so tragic! It must be HORRIBLE to lose someone in an unforunate
ACCIDENT.  One of my loved ones almost died horribly, how can I help you my
dear man?
 Love and kisses,
 Sigfried

messages.body:
X-Originating-IP: 




Dear Roy,

I appreciate your quick response,as this goes a long way to say that you are in
a position to assist me accomplish this transaction.

Well, as I made you to understand in my proposal,I need your assistance to
enable us receive this fund in your bank account instead of it being
confiscated by the finance firm were the fund was deposited.

However,For your assistance, you will stand the chance of getting some % of the
total fund while I will retain some % and 10% has been mapped out for any
expenses which we may incur in the course of concluding this transaction, which
includes telephone bills etc.

Please not that for a successful business transaction,there must be trust also
and being that I have not been able to locate the relative to my late client
for the past 3years now, therefore I will like to use you to accomplish this
objective because the bank are worried that i should have provided the  to my late client by now for the sake of mutual benefit you have to give
me your maximum cooperation.

To proceed,I will need the following information.Your full name and address,
fax number and your mobile phone number if any for easy communication and any
form of evidence for identification will also be appreciated.

When i  receive  these information i will forward an apllication for claim on
your behalf to the security company where the fund was deposited. 

Note:that I will present you as the beneficiary/next of kin to my client's
estate being his next of kin. I have in my  position,The relevant documents
covering this fund/claim.

Finally, I will need your total support for the succesfull completion of this
transaction.
You can also call me on 234-803-5311539 for further clarification.


I expect to hear from you soonest.

Regards,

Barrister.Martine Kelvin.

MARTINE KELVIN

messages.body:
My Dear Martine!  

 You did call, I listened to my voice mail, you are such a sweetie!  I just
tried to call you back, I tried your number FOUR times and kept getting a
message in a heavy foreign accent "This call cannot be completed, please try
again".  Ooooooh I am so frustrated.  PLEASE try to call me again, but for the
next few days I will be working constantly.  In my line of work it would not be
safe for me to answer the phone, my subjects demand my undivided attention.
 

Love 'n kisses,
 Sigfried

messages.body:
My Dear Martine,

 Please, what am I to DO? I really DO want to help you.  I'm sorry but my babies
need me. I mean Roy is such a lovely man but of course he cannot help me with
the heavy work.  It is so sad what happened.  Before I was born again and
became a servant to our lord, I used to work for the dark side of evil. I was
an agent for that nefarious organization KAOS, and my old partner, Shtarker,
was such a NINCOMPOOP. Life is NOT fair, look at what happened to YOUR family.

 Oh and DO get that Caps Lock key fixed, I can't feel your EMOTIONS!
 Love and kisses,
 Sigfried

messages.body:
My DEAR Martine,
 I am SO sorry that I missed your calls. I have had my mobile phone on Vibrate
and keep it thing in my front hip pocket, my trousers are TIGHT TIGHT TIGHT. I
have lost sensitivity in that area, (I am 62) and when I look at my phone I see
that I have missed your calls. Is your number
324 802 951 5352?
 I listened to your message and I can tell that you are UPSET, but have faith,
patience and most of all, perseverance, my dear man.  Good things comes to
those who WAIT, the Lord helps those that HELP THEMSELVES.

 I tried calling you again, but got through to a foreign operator who proceeded
to babble to me in a kind of tribal incantation and I could not understand WHAT
she was telling me, my Dear. So whatever you do, PLEASE keep trying me.  I
would like to hasten this business as you do.
 Love and Kisses,
 Yours is the Lord,
 Sigfried

messages.body:
My dear Martine,

 I DID receive you messages my dear man.  I DON'T know why your calls are not
going through to me.  I tried to call you FIVE more times.  Twice, a lady
picked up and she seemed restive, yet annoyed, as if I interrupted her throes
of passion with a late-night paramour.  Then three times it sounded as if
someone had picked up the phone and immediately placed it back on the hook.  Oh
what are we to DO??  And PLEASE fix that Caps Lock key, it makes you seem
so....so...HOSTILE!
 Love and kisses,
 Sigfried
messages.raw:
SIGFRIED ROY

Love and kisses,

Sigfried

messages.body:
My Dear Martine,

 You will have to excuse me, dear boy.  I am somewhat upset that I was wakened
to HORRIFIC news.  A man on the radio said that a very famous PANTHERA had been
mercilessly shot in the state of Ohio.  I LOVE cats, they are my babies and my
hands are trembling as I type this.  
 As for the items you mentioned, you never mentioned them before, sweetheart. 
Perhaps you are somewhat light in the loafers.  
 I will keep trying to phone you, as you will try me.  Please make a list of the
items you desire from me.

 Love and kisses,
 Sigfried

please act fast and get back to me .

messages.body:
My DEAR Martine,

Thank you for your sympathy, that's VERY sweet. I do not understand what you mean that I have ways that you do not like. Are you saying that you don't LIKE me? Or are you having some difficulty expressing yourself with the English language? I always think the BEST of people so I willNOT assume that you are being rude.

HONESTLY I have given you my telephone number, which is +34 XXX XXX XXX. I don't know why this has been a problem, but it has. When do you intend to telephone me? I do want to make sure I receive your call.

Love and kisses,

Sigfried

MARTINE KELVIN.

messages.body:
Dear patner,

Thanks for your mail,i have recived you bank account number but i need too know
that name of your bank and address so that it will be easier for the central
bank of nigeria to wire the fund as soon as we have secured the fund release
documents.

Dear patner,i have tried to explain to you that instead of you sending me money
through my bank account why not send via western union money transfer,it will
be faster, easier and saver for security reasons.

If you send the money to me through a bank account number,it will take more
days to clear here in nigeria,banking is not too computerise like your
country.it will waste too much time to get to me before gettint the documents.

Remember that the year have almost come to an end,we need to be fast to get

messages.body:
December 14

My DEAR Martine,
 It was so LOVELY to speak to you today.  My partner, I have tried to explain to
you that I am in a natural wildlife reserve high up in the mountains of
northern Barcelona where there is no nearby to access to money transfer places
like Western Union. I am on a socio-environmental excursion for my work with my
nubile Bulgarian assistant Peter Strokanov, and will not return until the 22nd
of December. I am so SORRY to have to tell you all my personal business
problems.  I do have a laptop with a powerful wireless connection to the
internet, so I am capable of sending international wire transfers even though I
am far away from the city 
 We have two options:

  1) We wait until December 23rd, when I  would be able to travel to a Western
Union facility.

OR

  2) I transfer to your account $1,500 US Dollars this evening (an extra 700 for
unforseen items). 
 
If you desire option 2, I please send me the bank information, which would be
an IBAN number. 
 
As a religious man, your faith will guide you along the right path. Please
hurry with your decision, there is a lot of money to be made!  He who hesitates
is.. well... I just thought of dear Roy.  Oh please hurry!
 Love and kisses,

 Sigfried

We have two options:

OR

2) I transfer to your account $1,500 US Dollars this evening (an extra 700 for unforseen items).

If you desire option 2, I please send me the bank information, which would be an IBAN number.

As a religious man, your faith will guide you along the right path. Please hurry with your decision, there is a lot of money to be made! He who hesitates is.. well... I just thought of dear Roy. Oh please hurry!

Love and kisses,

Sigfried

messages.body:
My DEAR Martine,

 Oh I am SO happy we are working together, you are SUCH a delight.  And it's so
nice to see that you have abandoned that DREADFUL addiction to the CAPS LOCK
key.
 
We have been very busy up here in the hills.  After what happened to Roy I have
been pursuing avenues that would make our job safer.  Peter and I have been
studying the behavior of the Basque Felid, which has the body of a tiger and a
head very similar to that of an antelope.  The Basque appears very threatening
yet is rather docile, which makes it an excellent substitute for the Bengals.
 
I will be so EXCITED to speak to you again.
 
Love and kisses,
 

Sigfried

messages.body:
My DEAR Martine,

 
I have VERY good news.  I contacted Western Union, they are such NICE people.
They suggested we use an internet wire transfer, which would arrive at the
Nigerian Bank that is the Designated Central Bank(DCB) of Nigeria.  Whereupon
it reverts to a standard transfer mechanism. It's VERY fast, 1 or 2 days. I'm
back from the wilderness on the 22nd, so give me a call!

 
Love and Kisses,

 
Sigfried
messages.raw:
SIGFRIED ROY

They suggested we use an internet wire transfer, which would arrive at the Nigerian Bank that is the Designated Central Bank(DCB) of Nigeria. Whereupon it reverts to a standard transfer mechanism. It's VERY fast, 1 or 2 days. I'm back from the wilderness on the 22nd, so give me a call!

messages.body:
My DEAR Martine,
 
You are SO understanding.  The kind man at Western Union strongly advised me to
do a bank transfer.  He said Western Union was a FABULOUS service for sending
money to friends and relatives, but not in a BUSINESS transaction.  He asked me
if I knew you personally and I told him how KIND you are and the TRAGEDIES you
suffered.  He said perhaps if I had some form of IDENTIFICATION and a PHOTO of
you he would feel MUCH better about approving the transfer.
 
Please be a DEAR and send a photo and passport.  You should hold up a sign in
the photo that says "EYE OF THE TIGER", this way the Western Union man will
know it's genuine.
 
OH please HURRY!
 
Love and kisses,
 
Sigfried

SIGFRIED ROY

Please be a DEAR and send a photo and passport. You should hold up a sign in the photo that says "EYE OF THE TIGER", this way the Western Union man will know it's genuine.

Love and kisses,

Sigfried

messages.body:
My DEAR Martine,This is TERRIBLE news!
http://www.cnn.com/2004/WORLD/africa/12/23/nigeria.blast/index.html
'20 die' in Nigeria fuel blaze
Thursday, December 23, 2004 Posted: 7:51 AM EST (1251 GMT) 
LAGOS, Nigeria -- At least 20 people were killed in a blast Tuesday at an oil
production facility in Lagos as they were stealing fuel, a Nigerian government
official said Thursday.

But I MUST tell you.  The reason the Western Union man advised me to ask you
for ID, is that HE said (and I did not want to tell you for fear of offending
you) that NIGERIA is a country full THIEVES.  He said that Western Union has
had many problems with CRIMINALS in NIGERIA so that they now have NEW rules for
money transfers that go there.  So please be a DEAR and send me the PHOTO of
yourself and your PASSPORT or DRIVERS LICENSE so I can transfer the money to
you.  Or else send me your IBAN number.
 
Love and kisses,
 
Sigfried
